metaData.title: Rinda - AI-Based Exhibition Face-to-Face Sales Support All-in-One Solution
metaData.description: From exhibition pre-strategy recommendations to real-time interpretation and post-event customer management. Rinda, your on-site sales AI assistant
metaData.keywords: Exhibition Sales, On-Site Sales, Face-to-Face Sales, B2B SaaS, Real-Time Interpretation, AI Agent, Conversation Analysis, Pre-Sales

first.label: Overcome the Limitations of On-Site Sales
first.description:
From pre-event preparation to on-site sales and customer management.
We've incorporated a team of 3 on-site sales experts into one Rinda.

second.label: During on-site sales, various challenges arise, such as budget, manpower, communication, and lead management.
second.description:
Now, collaborate with capable sales managers
and prepare for effective overseas expansion at a low cost.

advancePreparation.label: Advance Preparation
advancePreparation.title:
Perfect preparation is the beginning of success.
Leave the sales strategy to AI.

section1.label: Lead Discovery
section1.title:
Find potential customers
that match your desired persona.
section1.description: If you describe your customers to Rinda, it will automatically set the search conditions and allow you to view customer profiles.

section2.label: AI Message Sending
section2.title:
AI writes direct messages
and sends them automatically.
section2.description:
Simply set the customer group and select the sending method.
Rinda analyzes your information and sends messages as if they were written by a person.

section3.label: Pre-Event Strategy Planner
section3.title:
Create a to-do list for on-site activities
with a single click.
section3.description: It creates a checklist tailored to various factors such as on-site information and your company's information.

onsiteSale.label: On-Site Sales
onsiteSale.title:
Communicate quickly and manage efficiently
with a customized on-site customer response solution.

section1.label: Lead Discovery
section1.title:
Find potential customers
based on company data-based recommendation strategies.
section1.description: If you describe your customers to Rinda, it will automatically set the search conditions and allow you to view customer profiles.

section2.label: Business Card Scanning and Customer Management
section2.title:
Scanning business cards solves
customer management at once.
section2.description:
If you take a picture of the business card you received and upload it, the customer information is automatically saved.
You can manage customers more systematically by linking it with the conversation history.

accessibility.section2Region: Business card scanning and customer management section

afterCare.label: Post-Event Management
afterCare.title:
Analyze results at a glance,
and prepare for the next improved sales together.

analysis.title: Conversation Analysis
analysis.description:
Collect conversations and post-event feedback from the field,
and analyze them to provide insights.

followup.title: Follow-Up Reminder
followup.description:
Automatically send customized emails, messages, or proposals
at specific timings after sales.

roi.title: ROI Dashboard
roi.description: Automatically analyze and generate reports on ROI for campaigns, sales activities, and individual sales cases.

retention.title: Retention & Upsell Strategy Recommendation
retention.description:
Based on existing customers' usage patterns, discover additional purchase opportunities
and suggest appropriate upselling and cross-selling strategies.

segmentation.title: Customer Segmentation and Targeting Strategy
segmentation.description:
Analyze customer data to identify specific target groups
and suggest customized marketing and sales strategies for each group.

conversion.title: Contract and Purchase Conversion Tracking
conversion.description:
Track the process of customers leading to contracts or purchases,
and suggest follow-up actions for smooth progress.

competitor.title: Competitor Benchmarking Report
competitor.description: Recommend differentiated proposal strategies through market trends and competitor analysis.

relationship.title: Long-Term Customer Relationship Strengthening Strategy
relationship.description: Provide customized communication strategies to maintain continuous contact with customers and increase trust.

usecase.label: Use Cases
usecase.title:
Rinda, you can apply it anywhere.
So that your sales never stop.

conference.title:
International Conferences
and Seminars
conference.description:
It supports participant networking and real-time
Q&A to provide smooth communication.

startup.title: Global Startup Pitching Event
startup.description:
We help you make effective presentations by arranging
investor meetings and sharing pitching materials.

trade.title: Overseas Trade Consultation
trade.description:
We support trade negotiations by matching
customized buyer-seller matching and tracking consultation progress.

market.title: Regional Market Research
market.description: We help you make strategic decisions by analyzing local trends and providing consumer data.

process.label: Process
process.title:
Recruiting a group of AI sales experts,
It only takes 3 days.
process.subtitle: Efficient AI Sales Introduction
process.description:
Quickly and effectively introduce
customized AI sales solutions.
process.subdescription: We provide fast and stable support through a step-by-step process from introduction consultation to construction and operation.

step1.title: Inquiry for Introduction
step1.description: Conduct customized initial consultation for RINDA introduction

step2.title: Providing Quotation
step2.description: Provide customized quotation and optimized solution proposal

step3.title: System Construction
step3.description: Design and optimize customized AI sales environment

step4.title: Post-Support
step4.description: Provide R technical support and systematic operation management

items.question: Can I try it for free?
items.answer:
Currently, it is an open beta service, and you can try some limited functions for free. Advanced functions will be gradually
introduced after the official function is released, and please contact us separately if you need immediate introduction.

items.question: How do I make a payment?
items.answer:
Currently, it is an open beta service, and the payment system will be
notified through future inquiries. Please contact us separately if you wish to introduce it.

items.question: Do I need to install the program?
items.answer:
This service is a web-based service and can be used anywhere on a network service where Internet use is possible.
If you wish to use it in a closed environment such as an intranet, please contact us separately.

items.question: Can I purchase a tablet display?
items.answer:
Currently, we do not provide tablet displays separately, but they will be added to the future pricing plan.
Also, if you need a tablet device immediately, please contact us separately for detailed information.

overview.title: 1. Policy Overview
overview.content: This privacy policy has been established to protect California consumers' rights regarding personal information collected through the "Rinda" service (https://rinda.ai). The company processes personal information transparently and legally in accordance with CCPA requirements and provides the following rights to California residents.

dataCollection.title: 2. Personal Information Collection and Usage
dataCollection.intro: The company collects the following personal information to provide the "Rinda" service:

required.title: Required Items
required.content: Name, Email address, Contact information, Login information

additional.title: Additional Items
additional.content: IP address, Cookies, Service usage records

purposes.title: Usage Purposes
list: User experience improvement and personalized service

rights.title: 3. California Consumer Rights
rights.intro: Under CCPA, California consumers have the following rights:

access.title: Right to Access
access.content: Consumers have the right to access categories and specific pieces of personal information held by the company.

deletion.title: Right to Delete
deletion.content: Consumers can request deletion of their personal information under certain conditions.

optOut.title: Right to Opt-Out
optOut.content: Consumers have the right to opt-out of the sale or sharing of their personal information to third parties.

nonDiscrimination.title: Right to Non-Discrimination
nonDiscrimination.content: Consumers are guaranteed not to face any disadvantage or discrimination for exercising their privacy rights.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Sharing
thirdParty.content: The company does not sell or share California consumers' personal information with third parties except when required by law or with explicit consumer consent.

optOut.title: Opt-Out
optOut.content: Consumers can opt-out of third-party sharing of their personal information at any time through the 'Personal Information Access and Deletion Request' procedure below.

accessAndDeletion.title: 5. Personal Information Access and Deletion Requests

procedure.title: Request Procedure
steps: Submit requests through the contact information provided (email, phone, mail).
The company will process the request after completing reasonable procedures to verify consumer identity.

processingTime.title: Processing Time
processingTime.content: Results will be notified within 45 days of request receipt.

policyChanges.title: 6. Policy Changes and Updates
policyChanges.content: The company may modify this privacy policy due to legal changes, service improvements, or other reasons.

notification.title: Notification Method
notification.content: Changes will be notified through the "Rinda" service announcements or website, and the modified policy takes effect immediately upon posting.

contact.title: 7. Inquiries and Contact Information
contact.intro: For CCPA-related inquiries or personal information requests, please contact us at:

info.address: Address: Room 502, 99 Daehak-ro, Yuseong-gu, Daejeon (Tip Town)
